title: WEBDISK Invitation to Greek Designers
content:
The WEBDISK team would like to invite you to try our new file exchange tool at [www.webdisk.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018061509/http:/www.webdisk.gr/ "www.webdisk.gr")

The WEBDISK tool is a more stylish and robust alternative to FTP that was developed for the creative and printing industry in order to enhance remote collaboration and file management. It is not merely a file exchange tool as it provides additional functionality and customization.

We would be very happy to have the Greek Designers among the first to try our service.

Respectfully,  
The WEBDISK team.
author: webdisk
